BugReport.title: Bug report
BugReport.summary: The button "add to bag" doesn't work with shoes category
BugReport.component: "add to bag" button in the shoes section
BugReport.priority:
high open Darya Grigorenko Levochkin Egor Windows 11, Google chrome, version 96.0.4664.110, website https://www.asos.com/aldo/aldo-glaeswen-metal-hardware-slides-in-white-and-gold/prd/23705711?clr=white&colourWayId=60505815&cid=11476
open website https://www.asos.com/aldo/aldo-glaeswen-metal-hardware-slides-in-white-and-gold/prd/23705711?clr=white&colourWayId=60505815&cid=11476 Push the button "add to bag" shoes aren't added to bag shoes are added to bag
